mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sponsor (user_id, spon_number ,spon_date, spon_huwon, spon_money, spon_pay, spon_open, spon_content) VALUES (#{user_id}, #{spon_number}, #{spon_date}, #{spon_huwon}, #{spon_money}, #{spon_pay}, #{spon_open}, #{spon_content})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, SUM(spon_money) spon_money, spon_content, spon_open FROM sponsor GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY 2 DESC
